[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-lrucache](./harp-lrucache.md) &gt; [LRUCache](./harp-lrucache.lrucache.md) &gt; [setCapacityAndMeasure](./harp-lrucache.lrucache.setcapacityandmeasure.md)

## LRUCache.setCapacityAndMeasure() method

Resets the cache capacity and function used to measure the element size.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCapacityAndMeasure(newCapacity: number, sizeMeasure?: (v: Value) => number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newCapacity | number | The new capacity masured in units returned from \[\[sizeMeasure\]\] funtion. |
|  sizeMeasure | (v: Value) =&gt; number | Function that defines the size of element, if you want to measure number of elements only always return 1 from this function (default), you may also specify own function that measures entries by memory consumed, nubmer of sub-elements, etc. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
